definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: darken, dim (NH id.; Ar. gam=a cover, veil, conceal; Targum [[עֲמַם]] grow dark);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. sf. [[עֲמָמֻהוּ]] Ez Eze 31:8 dub., but prob. (as Thes) cedars did not eclipse him; [[עֲמָמוְּ]] Eze 28:3 no secret do they hold dark (= is held dark) for thee (Ges:§ 117 x).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יוּעַם זׇהָב]] La 4:1 (fig.) how is the gold dimmed ! cf. Bu.
